thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 2 of 102
thread.title: shay

author: shay
title: shay
text:
fast reliable delivery . even in busy times. bought quite a lot of products .
had only two items that arrived with an issue. opt not to return. wish the return process would be a little easier. would have ordered a lot more from them, as your using your imagination as far as how an item might fit you... or your history with a particular brand. the other issue i have, is that few items from seasons past are being sold as current . they don't claim these items are so i have no claim just wished it would be pointed out. one more thing i would have loved to see is a more detailed description of an item. sometimes its lacking. i have recommend this website to a lot of friends and will happily continue to both recommend and shop.
